title: Easy Whiskey Slush Recipe
description: Start freezing this refreshing cocktail the night before. It's a sweet, slushy combination of pineapple juice and whiskey, topped with a little lemon-lime soda, and served with a cherry.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Drinks Recipes Slushie Recipes Easy Whiskey Slush 5.0 (2) 2 Reviews 2 Photos Easy, pretty drink for the holidays or as a refreshing summer drink. Even my friends who say 'I don't like whiskey' love this drink. Submitted by kiwismom Updated on May 11, 2022 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo Prep Time: 10 mins Additional Time: 8 hrs Total Time: 8 hrs 10 mins Servings: 15 Yield: 15 servings Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 15 servings 1 (46 fluid ounce) can pineapple juice 1 (750 milliliter) bottle whiskey 1 (10 ounce) jar maraschino cherries with juice 1 (2 liter) bottle lemon-lime soda Directions Stir pineapple juice, whiskey, and maraschino cherries with their juice in a large freezer-safe container with a lid. Cover container tightly and freeze slush overnight. Scoop the whiskey slush into old-fashioned glasses, making sure each glass contains a cherry or two. Top with lemon-lime soda. name: kiwismom
instructions: Stir pineapple juice, whiskey, and maraschino cherries with their juice in a large freezer-safe container with a lid. Cover container tightly and freeze slush overnight.;Scoop the whiskey slush into old-fashioned glasses, making sure each glass contains a cherry or two. Top with lemon-lime soda.
